sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./GithubRepoCard.css"; import { Fade } from "react-reveal"; export default function GithubRepoCard({ repo }) { function openRepoinNewTab(url) { var win = window.open(url, "_blank"); win.focus(); } return (
openRepoinNewTab(repo.node.url)}>

{repo.node.nameWithOwner}

{repo.node.description}

{repo.node.primaryLanguage.name}

{repo.node.forkCount}

{repo.node.stargazers.totalCount}

{repo.node.diskUsage} KB

 ); }
